#/****************************************************
# * test_all_test_client
# * 2024-05-08 22:37:24
# * Generated by rpc framework makeService.py
#****************************************************/
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0)
project(test_all_test_client)  # 请替换成你的项目名称

set(PATH_TEST_PATH ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
include_directories(
    /usr/local/include/rpc
    ${PATH_PROJECT}
)
link_directories(/usr/local/lib/ ${PATH_PROJECT}/../lib)
link_libraries(
    mircorpc
    tinyxml
    )
set(EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH ${PATH_TEST_PATH}/test_tool_execut)
file(GLOB SOURCES ${PATH_TEST_PATH}/*.cc)
# 为每个.cc文件创建一个可执行文件
foreach(SOURCE_FILE ${SOURCES})
    # 获取文件名作为可执行文件的名字（去掉路径和扩展名）
    get_filename_component(EXECUTABLE_NAME ${SOURCE_FILE} NAME_WE)
    
    # 编译每个.cc文件为一个可执行文件
    add_executable(${EXECUTABLE_NAME} ${SOURCE_FILE})
    target_link_libraries(${EXECUTABLE_NAME}  protobuf interfaceService)
endforeach()
